references.paper_title: Break-a-scene: Extracting multiple concepts from a single image
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach for extracting multiple concepts from a single image, which is highly relevant to the task of fine-grained 3D object generation.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel self-supervised learning approach for training vision transformers, which is crucial for achieving high-quality 3D object generation.
This paper introduces ShapeNet, a large-scale dataset of 3D models that is widely used in the field of 3D object generation.

references.paper_title: An image is worth one word: Personalizing text-to-image generation using textual inversion
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for personalizing text-to-image generation, which is highly relevant to the task of creative 3D object generation.

references.paper_title: Learning shape templates with structured implicit functions
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel method for learning shape templates using structured implicit functions, which is highly relevant to the task of fine-grained 3D object generation.
